import React from 'react'; import '../styles/Dashboard.css'; import ArrivalRadar from './ArrivalRadar'; import GuestValueSpotlight from './GuestValueSpotlight'; import GuestTypeChart from './GuestTypeChart'; import ContractSnapshot from './ContractSnapshot'; const STATUS_LABELS = { active: 'Active', confirmed: 'Confirmed', 'checked-in': 'Checked In', 'checked-out': 'Checked Out', canceled: 'Canceled', 'no-show': 'No-Show' }; function Dashboard({ summary, bookings, loading, statusSummary = [], arrivalRadar = [], guestValueSpotlight = [], guestTypeData = [], contracts = [] }) { if (loading) { return
‚è≥ Loading dashboard data...
; } const stats = summary || { total_bookings: 0, total_nights: 0, total_revenue: 0, return_bookings: 0 }; const returnPercentage = stats.total_bookings > 0 ? ((stats.return_bookings / stats.total_bookings) * 100).toFixed(1) : 0; return (

üìä Sales Overview

Total Bookings

{stats.total_bookings}
this period

Total Revenue

${stats.total_revenue?.toFixed(2) || '0.00'}
earned

Total Nights

{stats.total_nights || 0}
booked

Return Bookings

{stats.return_bookings || 0}
{returnPercentage}% of total

üìç Booking Status Tracker

{statusSummary.length > 0 ? ( statusSummary.map((item) => (
{STATUS_LABELS[item.status] || item.status} {item.count}
)) ) : (
No statuses yet
)}

üìÖ Recent Bookings

{bookings && bookings.length > 0 ? ( {bookings.slice(0, 10).map((booking) => ( ))}
Guest Name Type Nights Area Revenue Date
{booking.guest_name} {booking.guest_type} {booking.nights} {booking.area_rented} ${booking.revenue.toFixed(2)} {new Date(booking.booking_date).toLocaleDateString()}
) : (

No bookings in this period yet

)}

üí° Insights

üí∞

Average Booking Value

${stats.total_bookings > 0 ? (stats.total_revenue / stats.total_bookings).toFixed(2) : '0.00'}

üè®

Avg Nights per Booking

{stats.total_bookings > 0 ? (stats.total_nights / stats.total_bookings).toFixed(1) : '0.0'}

üîÑ

Return Rate

{returnPercentage}%

); } export default Dashboard;
